# Harpy
Harpies are an avian human mutation, sprouting feathered wings and ruffled tails. They see the world through an ultraviolet view, slash with their claws dealing [color=#ec3a3a]piercing [/color]damage, and walk around on digitrade legs. Their most iconic ability, however, is to take to the skies!
## Sing your heart out
Harpies are capable of singing out a tune on the spot with their voice, allowing for you to play music wherever you are, as long as you aren't muffled
## Take to the skies!
Harpies can fly with their wings to increase their movement speed dramatically, at the cost of heavy stamina drain and a temporary inability to use their hands. Their wings give them better acceleration if there is no gravity on the station, but they still can't move without equipment when floating out in space.
## Weaknesses
Due to their digitrade legs, they are unable to wear any type of footwear. Along with this, harpies have sensitive lungs. This causes them to breathe [color=#1e90ff]3 times faster[/color] than other species and gasp when there is 0.2 combined mols of either miasma or CO2 in the air.
